title: Dororon Enma-kun
synopsis: Monsters are coming to the human world from the Hell in order to get human spirits. As people's minds are getting dirty, being attracted by the dirty spirits, the monsters break the rule to go to the human world.
voices: ['Nozawa, Masako', 'Sakai, Sumie', 'Kimotsuki, Kaneta', 'Takiguchi, Junpei', 'Tanonaka, Isamu', 'Shibata, Hidekatsu', 'Kamiyama, Takuzou', 'Shimada, Akira', 'Kondou, Takako', 'Shibata, Hidekatsu']
staff: [['Yabuki, Kimio', ['Director']], ['Katsumata, Tomoharu', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamayoshi, Yasuo', ['Episode Director']], ['Nagaki, Bonjin', ['Episode Director']]]
